thread.title: Abington Heights defeats Mountain View in girls volleyball
thread.title_full: Abington Heights defeats Mountain View in girls volleyball

author: Staff Report
title: Abington Heights defeats Mountain View in girls volleyball
text:
Abington Heights defeats Mountain View in girls volleyball Staff Report 
Cassandra Toth had six kills and eight aces and Emily Crowley had 14 assists to lead Abington Heights over Mountain View, 3-0, in a Lackawanna League girls volleyball match Monday. 
Grace Hambrose had eight aces for the Lady Comets. 
Rebekah Tiffany had eight points for Mountain View. 
Abington Heights (12-2) 25 25 25 Mountain View (5-10) 18 11 14 
JV: MV 2-0. 
Dunmore 3, Lackawanna Trail 0 
At Lackawanna Trail, Izzy Cooper had nine kills, 11 assists and 19 points and Abby Bessoir had seven kills, six aces and 11 points to lead Dunmore. 
Erika Bistran had five kills for the Lady Bucks. 
Allison Melnikoff had 11 digs for Lackawanna Trail and Tammi Perkins had 
10 digs. 
Dunmore (15-0) 25 25 25 Lackawanna Trail (1-14) 8 7 14 
JV: DUN 2-1. 
Blue Ridge 3, Susquehanna 0 
At Blue Ridge, Hayleigh Fekette had 18 assists and 14 points and Kalynne Myers had seven kills, five aces and five digs to lead the Raiders. 
Kim Klim had six digs for the winners, Megan Houlihan had six kills and 10 points and Candace Smith had 12 digs and nine points. 
Baily Barnes had five points for Susquehanna. 
Susquehanna (4-11) 20 18 10 Blue Ridge (14-2) 25 25 25 
JV: SUS 2-1. 
Montrose 3, Elk Lake 1 
At Montrose, Megan Dunne had 11 kills, five aces and 13 digs and Elizabeth Kelly had seven aces and 18 digs to lead the Lady Meteors. 
Emily Stankiewicz had six kills, 12 digs and 18 assists for the winners. 
Mikayla Meaders had 11 kills for Elk Lake. 
Elk Lake (3-11) 21 25 10 23 Montrose (10-6) 25 23 25 25 
JV: MON 2-1. 
Field hockey 
Bree Bednarski scored four goals to lead Wyoming Area to an 8-0 win over Abington Heights in a Wyoming Valley Conference match. 
Abington Heights (4-6) 0 0 — 0 Wyoming Area (11-2) 3 5 — 8 
WA — Gianna Gennetts (Emilie Wanko) 23:35 
WA — Bree Bednarski (Lexi Crossley) 14:37 
WA — Jillian Spak (Bednarski) 1:54 
WA — Bednarski (Wanko) 29:47 
WA — Bednarski (Madison Mulhern) 28:04 
WA — Spak (Wanko) 12:26
